text: The 1993 Vuelta a España was the 48th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in A Coruña, with an individual time trial on 26 April, and Stage 12 occurred on 7 May with a stage from Benasque. The race finished in Santiago de Compostela on 16 May. ==Stage 12== 7 May 1993 — Benasque to Zaragoza, {| |Stage 12 result {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team !
